name: 3D Model Viewer XBlock
desc: to include and view 3D .obj models within an edX course

name: ACID Xblock
desc: a block for testing the implementation of the XBlock runtime.

name: Adventure XBlock
desc: creating a simple "Chose Your Own Adventure" style simulation.

name: Animation XBlock
desc: shows students an animation they can go through. There is a set of images with corresponding text, and a slider for going through these images.

name: Brightcove Video XBlock
desc: to include Brightcove videos within an edX course

name: Drag and Drop XBlock
desc: exercise which asks students to drag and drop text or image elements into different buckets according to their content

name: Drag and Drop XBlock v2
desc: enhanced version of the Image Explorer XBlock. Due to incompatible data model with v1, the original XBlock still remains

name: Flash XBlock
desc: Embed Flash (.swf) files into your course.

name: Image Explorer XBlock
desc: to display tooltips on top of an image within the course content

name: LeaderBoard XBlock
desc: allows to display an arbitrary number of top scoring threads in an inline discussion, as well as top scores in a graded exercise.

name: Problem Builder XBlock
desc: Set of interactive exercises, and tools to automate the workflow of real-life mentoring within an edX course. It supports: free-form answers (textarea) which can be shared accross different XBlock instances (for example, to remind a student of an answer he gave before), MCQs (multiple choice questions), MRQs (multiple responses questions), rating scales, progression tracking (allowing to check that the student has completed the previous steps before allowing to complete a given XBlock instance).

name: Ooyala Video Player XBlock
desc: to include Ooyala videos within an edX course. It supports transcripts, overlays (to place raw text or html content at a specific moment in your video) and player tokens (to secure your video content using a token with an expiration time)

name: ORA2
desc: Version 2 of the Open Response Assessor Project. Provides functionality for peer assessment, self assessment, student training.

name: PDF XBlock (alternative)
desc: Another XBlock to embed PDF, with XBlock title and download buttons.

name: Pie Chart XBlock
desc: to include Pie chart within an edX course

name: Poll & Survey XBlock
desc: enables a course author to create survey/poll elements to get feedback from students. Poll XBlocks have one question, and a series of answers. Survey XBlocks have several questions.

name: Rating XBlock
desc: Rating and comment the video unit.

name: School Yourself
desc: This repository contains XBlocks for displaying School Yourself (SY) content on the edX platform. These will be used in the upcoming AlgebraX and GeometryX courses, developed for the High School Initiative.

name: Staff graded assignment
desc: Allows students to upload files to be graded by course staff.

name: Table XBlock
desc: Table XBlock is powerful tool used to create user-editable tables.

name: Video JS XBlock
desc: Use Video.js HTML5 player (www.videojs.com) instead of the default one.

name: Discussion XBlock
desc: a prototype of the discussion XModule as a separate, pure XBlock. Functional, but requires patches to edx-platform at the moment.

name: Group Project XBlock
desc: to allow students to work as a group of 2-5 on a group project, with peer grading between projects and team members. Functional, but requires patches to edx-platform at the moment.
